meanings.definition: A shot taken at random or without careful aim.
meanings.sent1: Potshotting can be fun during target practice.
meanings.sent2: The potshotting at the carnival game was challenging.
meanings.sent3: The potshotting contest at the fair had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her potshotting at the dartboard was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent5: The sound of potshotting echoed through the shooting range.

meanings.definition: The act of taking shots at a target without careful aim.
meanings.sent1: During the competition, his potshotting was impressive.
meanings.sent2: Potshotting requires focus and practice to improve.
meanings.sent3: The potshotting tournament was filled with excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her potshotting in archery class showed improvement.
meanings.sent5: The art of potshotting takes skill and precision to master.
